ChromedCat,"2021-08-08T16:37:57.577Z","A quaint and enjoyable escape to nature - with a Low price","

If not for a discount, I wouldn'
column2: t have given this set the chance it deserved. Since I&#39
column3: m a huge friends fan, I really liked the look of this set, but I was disappointed with how the interior was bare and lacking. Buying this set, I had low&nbsp
column4: expectations, but boy was I wrong! This set was great!

column2: of all, the building experience was separated in 4 bags, which made me feel I was getting more for my money. The set also had a beautiful colour scheme which made me feel relaxed every time I saw it.

column1: The Build was intricate yet well-paced, I did not feel bored at any time of the build and the details in this set are incredible! I appreciated all the greenery and thought out in the set! Especially love the new raccoon and hot pink kayak!
Overall I am thoroughly pleased with this set and I am glad to have it!
